Updated project so it uses 2.2 apis
Fixed text shadow size and cover art DPI
Added headphone unplug & remote control support
Layout shadow unification and landscape fix for HDPI
First steps of adding search support
Hum this way of adding the lib doesn't seam right when it wasn't done like that in the first place

Added a timer to the progressbar so that as long as the its kept pressed
a timer triggers and if the value has changed since last time the volume
has been sent it gets sent again.

Added basecode for fling change of the current song beeing played.
Needs comments
Fixed some tabbing issues, and added some comments
Dont know how I managed to mess up the link before, but now its right
Added warning popup for first start
Added toasts & context support to the GestureListener

Basic functionality for the albumes, when replaced the main view isn't
updated tho.

Seams like most of these views are essentially the same code over and
over again should probably be replaced with one class or inhereted to
the diffrent ones.

Added the TODO tag to one comment and removed an autogenerated comment
that no longer was valid.
Hopefully fixing so that this works
Added the missing %s to the Added Album string
Some clean up of the code
Added the context menu here to

Added context menu for these to so you can add an entire albume or
artist from a menu and replace to if thats what you like.

Extended BrowseActivity to hold more functionality, need to make it
awear tho if its suposed to search for albums or artists. That will come
next.
Moved some code to the base class (BrowseActivity) tho not compleate yet

Replaced all items with musicList and itemList with items, sorta the
opposite to what it used to be, this so that items have a consistent
meaning in all BrowseActivity and so that it can be inhereted from
there.

The need for musicList is because it can somehow differ from items,
unshure how this can be but there is an if-statement in the
asyncExecSucceeded method that checks again if it really got a list
containing the search words, mpd isn't doing a good job?

Renamed the variable musics to dispMusic to reflect what it really does
Added an Add Override to pick the right song and only that song, using
the generic one from BrowseActivity could pick several songs with
similar names across albums becuase it just searches all over the
library.

Added an Add with index to be able to reuser the else common code
between add and the pluslistener in asyncExecSucceeded (tho I have no
idea what hte pluslistener actually does)

Added this one to to the BrowseActivity classes, two lists here for the
music, probably should be reduced to one, one is needed tho so we can
add the correct song through it when activated.

Here to like in SongActivity the Add method needed overrideing, and
added Add with index as parameter because it made reusing code so much
simpler.
Changed coding style on the initial {

Moved the asyncSucess method down to BrowseActivity, mostly it was
identical tho the search activities do a filtering on the result to only
list the interesting ones

Removed the PlusListener since its no longer in the app and I think the
long press menu is a much better alternative. Anyways to readd it is
simple now just modify the method in BrowseActivity.

This view now also uses the BrowseActivitys async handling, didn't have
loading screen before so added that and the relevant string in
strings.xml
Set the album variable final so that it can be reused in the Runnable

Now this class to uses the BrowseActivity for adding the songs to the
list, getting uncertain about the way I'm going about this tho. Might
redo the logic here but the common code needs to be in a base class
atleast

Rewrote the structure for how BrowseActivity uses the classes that are
inhariting from it.

There is an UpdateList method that the classes should call at the end of
theire onCreate method, this method will call the asyncUpdate method in
an async thread, in there the classes should populate the item list with
what it wants to have end up in the list and BrowseActivity will take
care of that part and generate the menus.

Modified all classes to follow this behavior

Added an Add method to FSActivity so that long-press and the menu there
will work for both files and folders.
Added french translations (my commits feel empty these days ^^)
Added orrche to credits, the guy deserves it

First tries into this, managed to get the list to view, tho the check
button is still invisible.

Remove of selected items now work, would be nice if the checkboxes had
red x's instead of the green v in them, and maybe something should be
done about the buttons, they dont really look like they fit with the
interface.
Managed to lose the s in %s somehow
The playlist remove view should work now

Some code cleanup and moved the update code to a function and calling it
in onStart instead of onCreate because that seams to be a better place
to run it on, also calling it from playlistchange so that one can update
the playlist externaly and see the changes on the phone if the activity
is open.

Made the checkbutton unclickable so that the click goes right through to
the listview item and checks the checkbox.

Solved the conflicting update of the playlist, went with the update
function solution and calling it on both start and playlist update
MOAR MOAR Layout fixes git add .

* Added a way of listing playlists in the JMPDComm code, atleast I couldn't find any way to do it from standard.
* Added a basic activity to view, add, add and replace playlists.

* No way of saving playlists
Now one can delete a playlist, kinda silly since one can't save one yet, but it was fun adding the menus that way

And there we have a save function to the playlist, not pretty but I dont
know how to make those pretty.

Code cleanup and maybe some commenting left.
Removed song moving from context menu
Implemented song moving. The update bug is still there
Changed playlist edition UI with new interface concept

Fixed bug according to shortfuse. Haven't tested

Updated layouts & activities so they use the new header
Forgot to rename a string. Not that I don't like you PMix guys ;)

Added some optimization, the playlist doesn't get updated from the

Some variables set for the contextmenus values.

Had forgotten to add these files...

Hopefully fixed bug that causes the info screen to be out of sync with
reality, problem lay in that the MPDlib didn't have the right version of
the playlist cached, wow this most be done better in MPD.

Think it refreshes the playlist one time extra when the app starts now
tho.
Now everything should rely on MPD to update the playlist it self
Removed a WLAN popup, syko can be happy now.
Should fix problems with the volume beeing out of sync
Should display No song info now if it's unable to find the song
Fixed the behaviour of event listeners. That fixed the constant 3G reception/emission bug
The auto updater now uses refresh since last refresh instead
Sorting added. That's a nice bugfixing session there \!
Removed a lot of svn files

Backgrounded track update on resume. No more freezes on 3G
Music list size now checked. Knew I should have done this yesterday.
Updated german translation, added error message for streaming

Disabled ordering in FSActivity by disabling it in BrowseActivity. Every activity extending BrowseActivity now orders the stuff themselves like grownups. SongsActivity can now order Music classes based on their title.

*Switched to Android 2.2 sdk, still backwards compatible with 2.1
*Header text is now a button so you can put a OnClickListener on it
*In PlaylistActivity.java, if you click on the header text, the current playing song will be selected
Added option to sort item insensitively in the listArtist like functions
Fixed names with : in by removing split(': ') and replacing with substrings

Escape the string to find, to cope with album the have double quotes

Added update menu in settings. Added korean translation (thx to konata)
Playlist context menu change to use resource files

Browseractivity updated to use resource files
There is no point in saving the notification as it only causes thread problems. There was also a risk of memory leak. Fixes reccurent market bug
Should have fixed the NumberFormatException in settings for good
Added support for different streaming address
Fixed string comparaison bug. Null titles should not happen by the way, but I can't reproduce the bug
